mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_EQ_USE_RECORDM ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , analysis_code , use_date , start_time , end_date , end_time , work_load_num , unit_code , dept_code , patient_id , patient_sex , patient_age , patient_name , price , total_fee , alone_pay_num , year , month , charge_kind_id , busi_data_source_code , ex_id , is_input_flag , status , invalid_flag , remark , doctor_order_id , operator , positive_flag , sample_no , exposure_num , start_date , other_info , add_user , add_date , add_time
) VALUES ( #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{analysis_code} , #{use_date} , #{start_time} , #{end_date} , #{end_time} , #{work_load_num} , #{unit_code} , #{dept_code} , #{patient_id} , #{patient_sex} , #{patient_age} , #{patient_name} , #{price} , #{total_fee} , #{alone_pay_num} , #{year} , #{month} , #{charge_kind_id} , #{busi_data_source_code} , #{ex_id} , #{is_input_flag} , #{status} , #{invalid_flag} , #{remark} , #{doctor_order_id} , #{operator} , #{positive_flag} , #{sample_no} , #{exposure_num} , #{start_date} , #{other_info} , #{add_user} , #{add_date} , #{add_time} )

update.foreach:
UPDATE ASS_EQ_USE_RECORDM SET analysis_code = #{item.analysis_code} , use_date = #{item.use_date} , start_time = #{item.start_time} , end_date = #{item.end_date} , end_time = #{item.end_time} , work_load_num = #{item.work_load_num} , unit_code = #{item.unit_code} , dept_code = #{item.dept_code} , patient_id = #{item.patient_id} , patient_sex = #{item.patient_sex} , patient_age = #{item.patient_age} , patient_name = #{item.patient_name} , price = #{item.price} , total_fee = #{item.total_fee} , alone_pay_num = #{item.alone_pay_num} , year = #{item.year} , month = #{item.month} , charge_kind_id = #{item.charge_kind_id} , busi_data_source_code = #{item.busi_data_source_code} , ex_id = #{item.ex_id} , is_input_flag = #{item.is_input_flag} , status = #{item.status} , invalid_flag = #{item.invalid_flag} , remark = #{item.remark} , doctor_order_id = #{item.doctor_order_id} , operator = #{item.operator} , positive_flag = #{item.positive_flag} , sample_no = #{item.sample_no} , exposure_num = #{item.exposure_num} , start_date = #{item.start_date} , other_info = #{item.other_info} ,
add_user = #{item.add_user} ,
add_date = #{item.add_date} ,
add_time = #{item.add_time} ,
update_user = #{item.update_user} ,
update_date = #{item.update_date} ,
update_time = #{item.update_time}
WHERE group_id = #{item.group_id} and hos_id = #{item.hos_id} and copy_code = #{item.copy_code} and ex_id = #{item.ex_id}

mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, rowid, analysis_code, use_date, start_time, end_date, end_time, work_load_num, unit_code, dept_code, patient_id, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_name, price, total_fee, alone_pay_num, year, month, charge_kind_id, busi_data_source_code, ex_id, is_input_flag, status, invalid_flag, remark, doctor_order_id, operator, positive_flag, sample_no, exposure_num, start_date, other_info, add_user, add_date, add_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, cancel_date, cancel_time, cancel_user, submit_date, submit_time, submit_user, audit_date, audit_time, audit_user FROM ASS_EQ_USE_RECORDM WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and rowid = #{rowid}
